General.Name: Yunnan Chuangxin New Material Co Ltd
General.Description: Yunnan Energy New Material Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, offers film products in China and internationally. The company's film products include lithium-ion battery separators, such as base films and coated films; and BOPP films, which comprise cigarette films and flat films. It also provides packaging printing products, including cigarette label and aseptic packaging products; and paper packaging, comprising specialty paper products, such as laser transfer anti-counterfeiting paper, direct plating paper, and coated paper; holographic anti-counterfeiting electrochemical aluminum, transfer film, and other products. In addition, the company develops roll-form aseptic and pre-made aseptic brick package; A-type gable top package; and B-type gable top package. Further, it offers technical, investment, and technology services; engages in trading activities; and production and sale of new materials. The company was formerly known as Yunnan Chuangxin New Material Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Yunnan Energy New Material Co., Ltd. in October 2018. Yunnan Energy New Material Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Yuxi, China.
